  • Method Details

    • useReflection

      default boolean useReflection()
      Returns:
      if true, reflection might be used to locate the VariantsFactory

    • reflectionClassName

      default String reflectionClassName()
      Returns:
      the class name to use if reflection is used to find the VariantsFactory

    • useServiceLoader

      default boolean useServiceLoader()
      Returns:
      if true, the ServiceLoader might be used to locate the VariantsFactory

    • serviceLoaderClass

      default Class<? extends VariantsFactory> serviceLoaderClass()
      Returns:
      the class name to load from the ServiceLoader to find the VariantsFactory
